title: Product Sourcing & Market Research Specialist Amazon
job_overview:
Position Overview:
We are seeking a highly organized and resourceful Product Sourcing & Market Research Specialist to support our product development and sourcing efforts. This role will play a key part in identifying high-potential products on Amazon and other marketplaces, conducting competitive research, and finding reliable factories across China, Vietnam, and other global sourcing hubs.

Key Responsibilities:
Conduct in-depth product research on Amazon and other e-commerce platforms to identify top-selling and trending products based on direction provided

Analyze pricing, reviews, features, and competitor data to support new product opportunities

Research and build a database of qualified factories and suppliers in China, Vietnam, and other countries

Communicate with overseas factories to request quotes, lead times, MOQs, and certifications

Organize sourcing data into reports and supplier scorecards for easy comparison

Create PowerPoint presentations to support new product pitches or sourcing reviews

Collaborate with leadership to help prioritize product categories and markets

Monitor trends, gaps, and white space opportunities in the consumer product space

Assist in organizing sampling, quality checks, and pre-production sourcing

Requirements:
2+ years of experience in sourcing, product research, or international procurement

Familiarity with Amazon marketplace, Helium 10 or Jungle Scout a plus

Strong Excel and PowerPoint skills; ability to create polished reports and presentations

Fluent in English; Mandarin or Vietnamese a plus but not required

Excellent communication skills and follow-through

Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects at once

Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment
